articles.title: Vaping: Juul Labs agrees thousands of US settlements - BBC
articles.description: The e-cigarette manufacturer is accused of targeting teenagers with its advertising campaigns.
articles.content:
E-cigarette manufacturer Juul Labs is to settle more than 5,000 US vaping lawsuits, after being accused of targeting teenagers with its products. 
The deal was reached with about 10,000 plaintiffs i… [+1333 chars]
